name: Fiesta Frenzy
description:
Come play the all-new Augmented Reality (AR) game from Terra Reality, Fiesta Frenzy! Awaken your inner party animal as you pop party favors that appear all around. Watch out for present stealing clowns, flying cakes, and other party poopers that can ruin your party time!

Features:

- Simple, easy to use interactions make gameplay intuitive
- Play anywhere and see the party favors and party poopers fly around you
- Compete in two different modes, Fiesta Mode and Timed Mode
- See how your scores rank against players around the globe
- Connect with Facebook to make a profile and share your scores and achievements

PLEASE NOTE:
Be aware of your physical surroundings as you play Fiesta Frenzy to avoid injuries.
